name: Super Business Fighter
description:
Super Business Fighter es un juego competitivo 1 VS 1 en el que dos magnates de los negocios deberán invertir en empresas para obtener mayores beneficios que su rival.

Los empresarios, vistos como simples animales a los ojos de los magnates, presentarán distintas ofertas de negocio que se deberán evaluar en función al beneficio ofrecido, la estabilidad económica del empresario o si su personalidad se ajusta al sector del negocio.

Super Business Fighter is a competitive 1 VS 1 game in which two business magnates must invest in companies to obtain greater benefits than their rival.

Entrepreneurs, seen by the magnates as simple animals, will present different business offers that should be evaluated according to the benefit offered, the economic stability of the entrepreneur or if he has the right personality for the business sector.
